achievements: Key figure in the women's suffrage movement
Co-founder of the National Woman Suffrage Association
Arrested for illegally voting in the 1872 presidential election
Prolific author of essays, novels, and plays
Known for her critical theory and cultural commentary
Won the National Book Award for her novel 'The Volcano Lover'
Academy Award winner for her role in 'Dead Man Walking'
Known for roles in films such as 'Thelma & Louise' and 'Bull Durham'
Active political and social justice activist
Former United States Ambassador to the United Nations
Served as National Security Advisor under President Barack Obama
First African-American woman to hold both positions
Rose to fame after appearing on Britain's Got Talent in 2009
Known for her powerful voice and inspirational story
